title: Designing an Interdisciplinary Approach to Elementary Programming Education Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary programming concepts and understanding of math education theories
context.additional_context: 15-minute modular learning via mobile devices, developing computational thinking through integration with mathematics curricula.

learning_goals: Learners can classify and explain at least three technical and pedagogical characteristics of elementary-level programming environments
Learners can suggest at least two interdisciplinary approaches when designing programming activities linked to mathematics curriculum content
Learners can develop and evaluate mobile microlearning instructional design models suitable for large learner groups
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
